title: When will SKT T1 Skins come out?
body: Since patch 5.22, I have been maining Jax and have pretty much played him for 90% of my games. I really liked the SKT T1 Jax but I didn't buy him from September (when Worlds ended). Is there any specific or approximate dates on when SKT T1 Skins will be available?

replies.body: Pretty sure they got released into pbe so shouldn't be long now

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ukAw08YJ,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-04-16T14:54:50.870+0000)
>
> Pretty sure they got released into pbe so shouldn't be long now

He means the older ones when they won back in Season 3 but yes Renekton, Ryze, Azir, Sivir, Alistar and Elise will now have the new SKT skins and they look really good. But they won't come out the next patch due to them wanting to make the Azir skin due to Easyhoon being a big part of their win at worlds and during the season :)

> [{quoted}](name=SKT Pride,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ukAw08YJ,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2016-04-16T15:22:09.237+0000)
>
> He means the older ones when they won back in Season 3 but yes Renekton, Ryze, Azir, Sivir, Alistar and Elise will now have the new SKT skins and they look really good. But they won't come out the next patch due to them wanting to make the Azir skin due to Easyhoon being a big part of their win at worlds and during the season :)

Don't they normally only re release the old championship skins during worlds then ?

> [{quoted}](name=Knuuckles,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ukAw08YJ,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-04-17T02:37:20.085+0000)
>
> Don't they normally only re release the old championship skins during worlds then ?

Yes and no, Last year they brought them out think 2-3 times during the year. But yeah they only bring them out at worlds. you can get them through crafting but its very rare that you will be able to get through them.
anyways I just got SKT T1 vayne skin through crafting, but I don't think I will use it coz I don't play vayne lol
Most probably with the mid year invitational thing or what ever the bigger regions compete in. i don't really follow lcs :^)
